skill.name: storage-management
skill.description: Manage storage devices and resources in Proxmox. Monitor storage usage, allocate resources, and plan storage expansion for your virtualization infrastructure.
skill.summary: Manage storage devices and resources in Proxmox. Monitor storage usage, allocate resources, and plan...
skill.author: DataKnifeAI

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation with no executable code. No security vulnerabilities detected. The actual implementation would be in the Proxmox VE MCP server codebase.

content.value_statement: Proxmox storage management is complex and time-consuming. This skill provides AI-powered tools to monitor, analyze, and optimize your storage infrastructure effortlessly.
actual_capabilities: List all storage devices in Proxmox cluster
Get storage capacity and utilization details
Track storage allocation for VMs and containers
Identify storage bottlenecks and performance issues
limitations: Requires Proxmox VE MCP server installation
Only works with Proxmox Virtual Environment
Actual implementation depends on MCP server codebase
Limited to storage operations exposed by Proxmox API

use_cases.title: Storage Capacity Planning
use_cases.description: Analyze storage usage trends and plan expansion before reaching capacity limits

use_cases.title: Storage Performance Monitoring
use_cases.description: Monitor storage health and identify bottlenecks affecting VM performance

use_cases.title: Storage Resource Optimization
use_cases.description: Rebalance storage allocation and optimize resource utilization across the cluster

prompt_templates.title: Storage Overview
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all storage devices in my Proxmox cluster with their capacity and current usage

prompt_templates.title: Capacity Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze storage usage across all nodes and identify which devices need expansion in the next 3 months

prompt_templates.title: Performance Troubleshooting
prompt_templates.prompt: Check storage performance metrics and identify any bottlenecks that might be affecting VM performance

prompt_templates.title: Detailed Node Storage
prompt_templates.prompt: Get detailed storage information for node 'proxmox-node-1' including usage, allocation, and performance data

best_practices: Monitor storage capacity weekly to avoid unexpected full disks
Maintain at least 20% free space on all storage devices for optimal performance
Use different storage tiers for different workload types (SSD for VMs, HDD for backups)
anti_patterns: Ignoring storage alerts until disks are completely full
Storing VM disks and backups on the same storage device
Not planning storage expansion until reaching 95% capacity

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Proxmox versions?
faq.answer: The skill works with Proxmox VE 6.0 and later versions that support the API endpoints used by the MCP server.

faq.question: What are the storage monitoring limits?
faq.answer: Limits depend on your Proxmox cluster size. The skill can monitor unlimited nodes and storage devices within a single cluster.

faq.question: How does this integrate with existing monitoring tools?
faq.answer: The skill complements existing tools by providing AI-powered analysis and natural language queries for storage management tasks.

faq.question: Is my storage data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill only reads storage information through Proxmox API. It cannot modify or delete any storage data.

faq.question: The skill isn't showing my storage devices. What's wrong?
faq.answer: Ensure your Proxmox VE MCP server is running and properly configured with API credentials for your cluster.

faq.question: How does this compare to Proxmox's built-in storage management?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI-powered insights and natural language interface while using Proxmox's native APIs under the hood.
